bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:          Rees,
I have gotten my name clearly a number of time and in response to asking for it.
I posted the files. I guess you missed them.
 
I only leave my files up for two days now to give room to the group.
If you want I can post them again.
 
Bruce


  Bruce Halliday
